message:
SYSTEM: Elozano_resultsINRIA.pdf: Página 34
Our approach 
•
SKOS is an ontology for concepts 
•
Subjects in descriptions 
•
Clusters for different labels with similar meaning 
•
Semantic relationships with other concepts 
•
Represented in OWL (as our models are) 
•
Minimal semantic commitment 
•
Web-oriented representation 
 
We lose inference power (only hierarchical), but gain flexibility 
 
34 
Conceptual Modeling Supported by Semantic Techniques 
Composition
speaker: SYSTEM
